Feature1.title: Human-first AI
Feature1.description: We work with the finest children's book illustrators and authors to guarantee that you will never receive anything unexpected.

Feature2.title: Total Data Privacy
Feature2.description: We are GDPR compliant and we guarantee to never sell your data, and follow industry-standards to protect your anonymity and ensure everything about you or your child will be totally protected.

Feature3.title: Artistry You Need To See
Feature3.description: We work with REAL Artists to ensure that what you get is in like with what you expect -- and often times it's even better!

Feature4.title: Authored for YOUR Child's Interests & Developmental Timeline
Feature4.description: We partner with REAL Authors to ensure that each story contains only elements that are appropriate
